wikipedia_page.main: Carolina (Carla) Romano (born 1969 in Dundee) is a Scottish  journalist and producer of Italian descent. Romano studied French and politics at the University of Dundee and has a postgraduate diploma in journalism from the University of Strathclyde.

response: Gattuso is married to Monica Romano, a Scottish woman of Italian descent. Her father Mario was a millionaire restaurateur who died in 2011, and her sister is television presenter Carla Romano. They have two children."Gattuso at Fiorentina, five things to know about the coach". Italy24news. 25 May 2021. Retrieved 3 July 2021.

*On 20 July, Richard Arnold and Carla Romano announced they would be leaving GMTV, after 10 years with the company, to pursue their careers elsewhere.Richard Arnold, Carla Romano depart GMTV Digital Spy, 20 July 2010
